name: Genkan: Between Light and Dark
description:
Dualism seperates. Dark and light seem to be opposite. But shadows need both. Spaces that are inbetween matter. Light and dark should always coexist. 

In a graveyard in Japan, some spirits are willing to help you restore peace. Find your way through hallways to the dark space “Genkan”, claim the spirits and bring them to  light to create the space "inbetween".
